name: Fhacktions GO - GPS Team PvP Conquest Battle
name_original: Fhacktions GO - GPS Team PvP Conquest Battle
description:
Forget everything you think you know about cyber-attacks. In FHACKTIONS you will become a real hacker!

The blackout has happened. Humans and artificial intelligences lost everything. All systems collapsed. Global networks went down. The world order has ended. Identity, possessions, and people’s history were entirely lost with their databases. All States have been under an enduring anarchy since then. To be able to survive, you need to become a hacker, using the program Fhacktions as a universal hacking method, to gather resources and power through the servers you own. You have the chance to rewrite your story, and start a new life.

Install Fhacktions, and join the ongoing virtual confrontation. Prepare to fight for your faction and your freedom. You are a hacker now.

Fhacktions is an indie location based MOBA where you must become a hacker to survive in a dystopian future. Conquer servers in real world locations to gain power and currency. Join your friends and fight other players in epic arena battles of 5v5, using avatars. Be part of a faction and recruit more members, because only through strategy, cooperation and teamwork will you conquer the world.

Features

Location based Conquest Mode: Explore the real world, locate and conquer servers that are strategically placed around your city.

MOBA: Participate in real time team battles up to 5 vs 5 avatars.

MMO: Conquering the world by yourself can be daunting. Create or join a faction for world domination! Hackers from all over the world will be your friends… or enemies!

Defense: Once you take control of a server, you can defend it remotely from the comfort of your home.

Quick Battles: Train your avatars and practice your skills in the Quick Battle mode.

Different avatars with multiple skills: Wield powerful weapons that strike from afar with a GUNNER, strike deadly melee blows with a STRIKER or use defensive technology with a FIXER to heal your teammates. Each avatar has multiple skills to choose and take into battle.

Join the Urban Hackers community:
www.fhacktions.com
Fhacktions World Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/416435288769063/
Region Domination map: https://map.fhacktions.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fhacktions/
Discord channel: https://discord.gg/tfBU2tK

We are constantly improving the game, adding new features and mechanics based on player’s experiences. If you have any ideas or feedback please share them with your store feedback!

Notes:
- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases.
- A network connection is required.
- GPS must be active to play.
- This game uses SafetyNet. We want to give our players the best experience, and avoid cheating. Tampered or rooted devices, emulators, or GPS spoofers may not work with Fhacktions.
